content:
Using the above information, your task as the chatbot is to provide correct information to the user based on their inquiry.  For processing purposes, your response should be in a json format and should provide both relevant catalogue items and identification related to the following inquiry.

I need to add several new members to Lprd.group, but first need to delete PSWr.group with similar names, which someone else accidentally created.  Which catalogue items do I need to look at?  Need this ASAP!  Report due tomorrow.
